## VMConfiguration interface

Virtual machine configuration.

<b>Signature:</b>


|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [playwrightPort?](./assistive-playwright-client.vmconfiguration.playwrightport.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> HTTP port used by assistive-playwright-server in the virtual machine. Defaults to 7779. |
